game.name: Two Worlds II - Soundtrack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The official “Two Worlds II” Soundtrack presents on over 90 minutes the stirring music from the RPG - including the title song in various remix versions, the Credits Song "Little Teardrop" as well as 11 Antaloorian Tavern songs.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The official “Two Worlds II” Soundtrack presents on over 90 minutes the stirring music from the RPG - including the title song in various remix versions, the Credits Song "Little Teardrop" as well as 11 Antaloorian Tavern songs.
